title: Routes du soleil
creator_credit: French Tourist Office and Max Sautet
brief_description: Presents a colorful tour of Provence in the South of France, by two tourists, complete with camera and pet duck. Shows both the historical and contemporary scene, accompanied by appropriate music and commentary with well-timed humour enlivening the beautiful scenery.
description: Presents a colorful tour of Provence in the South of France, by two tourists, complete with camera and pet duck. Shows both the historical and contemporary scene, accompanied by appropriate music and commentary with well-timed humour enlivening the beautiful scenery.
